item.title: BPM 银行称其 Anima 出价已超过接受门槛
item.description: Banco BPM SpA 表示，其对 Anima Holding SpA 的收购要约已被足够多的资产管理公司股东接受，达到了其设定的最低门槛。【原文：Banco BPM SpA said its takeover offer for Anima Holding SpA has been accepted by enough of the asset manager’s shareholders to meet the minimum threshold it has set.】

item.title: 日本央行暗示对关税问题日益谨慎，利率押注减弱
item.description: 日本央行根据分行经理们的意见撰写的一份报告传达了对贸易紧张局势升级对全球经济的潜在影响日益谨慎的态度，这进一步刺激了交易员们减少对加息的押注。【原文：A Bank of Japan report based on input from branch managers conveyed increasing caution over the potential impact on the global economy from escalating trade tensions, giving traders further incentive to pare bets on rate hikes.】

item.title: 壳牌下调澳大利亚工程季度天然气产量预期
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）预计，2025 年第一季度的天然气产量和液化天然气产量将低于之前的预期，理由是澳大利亚的意外检修和恶劣天气。【原文：Shell Plc sees lower natural gas production and LNG volumes in the first quarter of 2025 than previously expected, citing unplanned maintenance in Australia and adverse weather.】

item.title: 市场疲软加剧，欧洲天然气价格延续跌势
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格跌幅扩大，跟随石油和全球股市走低，因为关税引发的市场崩溃进一步加剧。【原文：European natural gas prices extended declines, following oil and global stocks lower as the tariff-induced market rout worsened.】

item.title: 印尼银行在重新开业前干预离岸印尼盾
item.description: 在长达一周多的假期结束后，印尼盾将于周二重新开放，在此之前，印尼央行对离岸印尼盾市场进行了干预。【原文：Bank Indonesia intervened in the offshore rupiah market ahead of what could be a turbulent reopening for the currency Tuesday after over a week-long holiday.】

item.title: 特朗普关税和战争重创谢克尔，以色列将维持汇率不变
item.description: 以色列央行将连续第 10 次维持利率不变，因为它要监控不断疲软的谢克尔和被战争削弱的经济状况，而美国提高关税只会增加其复杂的任务。【原文：Israel’s central bank is set to hold interest rates for a 10th consecutive time, as it monitors a weakening shekel and the state of the war-weakened economy, with higher US tariffs only adding to its complicated task.】

item.title: 洪山获得 5.19 亿美元贷款用于收购放大器制造商马歇尔
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国风险投资公司洪山资本集团已获得 4.75 亿欧元（约合 5.23 亿美元）的多期贷款，为其收购音响设备制造商 Marshall Group AB 提供资金。【原文：Chinese venture capital firm HongShan Capital Group has obtained a €475 million ($523 million) multi-tranche loan to fund its acquisition of audio equipment maker Marshall Group AB, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国 2 月工业生产降幅超预期
item.description: 德国 2 月份的工业生产降幅超过预期，凸显出在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的激进贸易政策带来新的不利因素之前，德国关键部门已经面临的挑战。【原文：German industrial production dropped more than expected in February, underscoring the challenges for the country’s key sector already ahead of new headwinds from US President Donald Trump’s aggressive trade policy.】

item.title: 哈利法克斯称英国 3 月份房价连续第二个月下跌
item.description: 据英国最大的抵押贷款机构之一称，英国房价连续第二个月下跌，原因是购房者避免房产税上调的时间已所剩无几。【原文：UK house prices fell for a second straight month as time ran out for buyers to avoid an increase in property taxes, according to one of the country’s biggest mortgage lenders.】

item.title: 市场避险情绪升温，美元融资需求增加
item.description: 周一，随着避险情绪加深对全球金融市场的冲击，美元融资需求出现回升势头。【原文：Demand for dollar funding picked up momentum Monday as deepening risk aversion rattled the global financial market.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数直播：特朗普关税暴跌加深，股市将暴跌
特朗普坚守关税立场，全球市场崩溃加剧
item.description: 周一，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策给金融市场带来的屠杀有增无减，亚洲股市从开盘起就遭受重创，美国的股票期货也显示，上周 5 万亿美元的损失还没有结束。【原文：The carnage in financial markets unleashed by President Donald Trump’s tariffs continued unabated on Monday, with Asian equities pummeled from the open and stock futures in the US showing that last week’s $5 trillion wipeout isn’t over.】

item.title: 中国讨论加快刺激措施以应对特朗普关税
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，面对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税攻势，中国的政策制定者们在周末讨论了稳定经济和市场的措施，包括是否加快释放刺激政策以促进消费的计划。【原文：China’s policymakers discussed measures over the weekend to stabilize the economy and the markets in the face of US President Donald Trump’s tariff onslaught, including whether to accelerate plans to unleash stimulus to bolster consumption, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: DeepSeek 和清华开发自我完善的人工智能模型
item.description: DeepSeek 正在与清华大学合作，减少人工智能模型所需的训练，以降低运营成本。【原文：DeepSeek is working with Tsinghua University on reducing the training its AI models need in an effort to lower operational costs.】

item.title: 非洲住房最昂贵的城市计划修复价值 640 亿美元的市场
item.description: 开普敦是非洲房地产价格最昂贵的城市，随着成千上万的人涌入这座大都市寻求更高质量的生活，开普敦计划让开发住宅变得更加容易，这给其 1.2 万亿兰特（640 亿美元）的住宅房地产市场带来了压力。【原文：Cape Town, Africa’s most expensive city for real estate, plans to make it easier to develop homes as thousands flock to the metropolitan for a better quality of life, putting pressure on its 1.2 trillion rand ($64 billion) residential property market.】

item.title: 全球紧张局势加剧，新西兰增加国防开支
item.description: 在太平洋地区与中国的紧张关系日益加剧的情况下，新西兰将把国防开支提高到国内生产总值的 2% 以上，旨在建设一支现代化、具有作战能力的军队。【原文：New Zealand will boost defense spending to more than 2% of gross domestic product, aiming to build a modern, combat-capable military amid rising tensions with China in the Pacific.】

item.title: 亚洲新兴货币下滑，"逃向安全 "加速
item.description: 由于贸易紧张局势升级助长了风险厌恶情绪，包括亚洲货币在内的新兴市场资产在整个市场的避险情绪中遭到抛售。【原文：Emerging market assets including Asian currencies sold off amid a flight to safety across markets as escalating trade tensions fueled risk-off sentiment.】

item.title: 中国停止进口美国液化天然气，创上次贸易战以来最长停运时间
item.description: 中国已经有 60 天没有从美国进口液化天然气了，这是五年来最长的空档期，因为北京和华盛顿之间的关系恶化导致中国的买家转移了货物。【原文：China hasn’t imported liquefied natural gas from the US for 60 days, the longest gap in five years, as worsening relations between Beijing and Washington lead the nation’s buyers to divert shipments.】

item.title: 高盛称基本面对冲基金两天亏损 5
item.description: 由于特朗普政府宣布加征关税引发市场抛售，高盛集团的全球基本面多空对冲基金客户在截至周五的两天内下跌了4.7%。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s global fundamental long-short hedge fund clients were down 4.7% over two days through Friday, as the Trump administration’s tariff announcement triggered a selloff.】

item.title: 高盛上调经济衰退风险，提前发出美联储降息呼吁
item.description: 在特朗普政府宣布加征关税后，高盛集团的经济学家们上调了对经济衰退可能性的评估，并将美国联邦储备委员会下一次降息的预测时间提前。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. economists raised their recession probability assessment and brought forward the forecast timing of the next US Federal Reserve interest-rate cut following the Trump administration’s tariff announcement.】

item.title: 中国豆粕因供应担忧而大幅上涨，中国政府采取报复行动
item.description: 中国豆粕价格在节后首个交易日飙升，原因是全球最大的两个经济体之间再次爆发的贸易战威胁到豆粕供应。【原文：China’s soybean meal prices surged on the first day of trading after a holiday, as a renewed trade war between the world’s two largest economies threatened supplies.】

item.title: 德国默茨的问题：他能花掉一万亿欧元吗？
item.description:
对于一个经常难以完成任务的国家来说，基础设施和军事投资并不简单。【原文：

Investment in infrastructure and military isn’t straightforward in a country that often struggles to get things done.

】

item.title: 全球经济增长担忧加剧，印度股市创六月以来最大跌幅
item.description: 由于投资者对贸易战扩大的风险及其对全球经济增长的影响做出了反应，印度股市周一大幅下挫，与东京和悉尼的基准股指齐跌。【原文：Indian equities plunged Monday, joining benchmarks from Tokyo to Sydney, as investors reacted to the risks of an expanding trade war and its impact on global economic growth】

item.title: 中国将稀土作为与特朗普贸易战的武器
item.description: 中国限制稀土出口，扩大了利用关键矿产作为贸易武器的范围，有可能动摇从电动汽车到武器装备等高科技制造业广泛使用的关键材料的全球供应。【原文：China has expanded its use of critical minerals as a trade weapon with curbs on exports of rare earths, threatening to shake-up the global supply of key materials used widely in high-tech manufacturing from electric vehicles to weaponry.】

item.title: 澳大利亚大选前展望赤字略有扩大
item.description: 根据周一发布的一份大选前更新报告，澳大利亚本财年和下一财年的预算赤字将略有扩大，该报告强调了在唐纳德-特朗普总统宣布加征关税后，预测中的不确定性比往常更大。【原文：Australia’s budget will record slightly wider deficits this fiscal year and next, according to a pre-election update released Monday, which highlighted greater-than-usual uncertainty in forecasts following President Donald Trump’s tariff announcement.】

item.title: 关税加剧风险，罗马尼亚将维持利率不变
item.description: 由于全球贸易紧张局势加剧了国内政治和财政风险，预计罗马尼亚央行将在第五次会议上维持利率不变。【原文：Romania’s central bank is expected to leave interest rates unchanged for a fifth meeting as global trade tensions compound internal political and fiscal risks.】

item.title: 受关税担忧影响，亚洲股指创 14 年来最大跌幅
item.description: 由于担心贸易战对全球经济的影响，中国股市引领了一场广泛而深入的大跌，亚洲股市暴跌，其中一个关键基准指数的跌幅为 14 年来最大。【原文：Stocks in Asia slumped, with a key benchmark sliding by the most in 14 years, as Chinese shares led a broad and deep selloff on worry over the trade war’s impact on the global economy.】

item.title: 欧拉二月份销售额增加，电动摩托车尚未推出
item.description: Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. 将其尚未推出的电动摩托车和电动滑板车的预订量计入了 2 月份的销售数字，使其市场份额看起来更大，因为该公司正在努力赢回投资者的信心。【原文：Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. counted its yet-to-be launched electric motorcycles and e-scooter bookings in its February sales number, making its market share look larger as it struggles to win back investor confidence.】

item.title: VIX 指数飙升表明 "恐慌"，全球股市下跌加速
item.description: 虽然全球股市正在加速下跌，但风险指标显示，美国股市正在领跌。【原文：While the stock-market rout is accelerating around the world, measures of risk indicate the US is leading the way.】

item.title: 全球市场低迷，印度投资者为本周艰难开局做好准备
item.description: (彭博社）— 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：(Bloomberg) — Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】
